item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – A/T ARM Switch

remarks.para: May be inoperative OFF provided approach minimums do not require use of autothrottle system.

note.para: With an inoperative Thrust Management Computer, the following displays on EICAS will be affected:

numlitem.para: EGT amber indications which are normally inhibited during takeoff or Go-Arounds will be operative.
Use a rated thrust for takeoff.
Use manual thrust reference selector (located on EICAS control panel) to set takeoff, climb and Go-Around thrust.
Thrust reference mode (TO, CLB, etc) will not be available.
Downgrade aircraft category dispatch status to CAT 1.

placard.para: Placard A/T ARM Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
